document.full_text: goldman sachs invested more than $1.3 billion from libya's sovereign-wealth fund in currency bets and other trades in 2008 and the investment lost more than 98 percent of its value, the wall street journal reported, citing internal goldman documents.
document.title: goldman traded $1.3 billion in libyan funds: report
lines_and_colors: goldman sachs invested more than $1.3 billion from libya's sovereign-wealth fund in currency bets and other trades in 2008 and the investment lost more than 98 percent of its value, the wall street journal reported, citing internal goldman documents.
